title: outlier_detection_stats
description: Instrumentation data specific to the outlier detection jobs.

parameters.description: List of job parameters specified by user or determined by algorithmic heuristics

n_neighbors.description: Defines the value for how many nearest neighbors each method of outlier detection will use to calculate its outlier score.

methods.description: List of methods that outlier detection uses.

compute_feature_influence.description: If true, the feature influence calculation is enabled.

feature_influence_threshold.description: The minimum outlier score that a document needs to have in order to calculate its feature influence score.

outlier_fraction.description: The proportion of the data set that is assumed to be outlying prior to outlier detection.

standardization_enabled.description: If true, then the following operation is performed on the columns before computing outlier scores: (x_i - mean(x_i)) / sd(x_i).

elapsed_time.description: Job runtime so far in ms.
